name: gldt-swap-monorepo
description: GLDT frontend app and GLDT canister
author: Bochsler Consulting

scripts.build: echo "Please use the 'realbuild' script (this is to avoid dfx to be able to call for a unwanted build by itself)"
scripts.realbuild: npm run build:back && npm run build:front
scripts.build:back: scripts/build-canister.sh gldt_core && npm run build:candid && npm run build:declarations
scripts.lint:front: cd client && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.start: dfx stop && dfx start --background --clean && npm run deploy
scripts.restart: cd client && npm run stop; npm start && cd ..
scripts.test: echo "No tests yet! Please write some unit tests!"
scripts.postinstall: cd ./client && npm install && cd ..; echo 'If installing locally, you should also ensure that ic-wasm is installed (cargo install ic-wasm), as well as wasmtime (see https://wasmtime.dev ).'
